name: Zealot Carmainerose
description: A zealot fully immersed in an enraged belief
story: A Banshee who holds a grudge against the Church of the Goddess for rejecting her wishes. After finding out they share an enemy and a grudge, she joined the Chaos Sect and is now working with them to spread the word of Chaos. However, her personality is a poor match for the job, and now she is pondering how to fulfill her duties.
get_line: Join the Chaos Sect and you can become just as strong as me.

relations.description: Zealot Carmainerose is thankful to have someone like Chaos Sect Axe listen to her story and take her side.
Zealot Carmainerose can't stand to see Chaos Inquisitor act like he's better than her.

specialty.name: Fanatic Recruitment
specialty.description: She will do whatever it takes to spread the word of Chaos.

type.name: Unknown Knowledge
type.description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.

enhancements.description: When attacking, increases Effectiveness if the target is an Earth elemental Hero.
When attacking, increases Effectiveness by 3% if the target is an Earth elemental Hero.
When attacking, increases Effectiveness by 10% if the target is an Earth elemental Hero.
When attacking, increases Effectiveness by 20% if the target is an Earth elemental Hero.
Increases Defense.
Increases Defense by 2%.
Increases Defense by 5%.
Increases Defense by 10%.
Increases Critical Hit Damage.
Increases Critical Hit Damage by 2%.
Increases Critical Hit Damage by 5%.
Increases Critical Hit Damage by 10%.
Has a chance to inflict unhealable for 1 turn when attacking an Earth elemental Hero with Vampirism.
Has a 10% chance to inflict unhealable for 1 turn when attacking an Earth elemental Hero with Vampirism.
Has a 30% chance to inflict unhealable for 1 turn when attacking an Earth elemental Hero with Vampirism.
Has a 60% chance to make unhealable for 1 turn when attacking an Earth elemental Hero with Vampirism.
Increases Health.
Increases Health by 3%.
Increases Health by 8%.
Increases Health by 15%.
When attacking, increases Effectiveness if the target is an Earth elemental Hero.
When attacking, increases Effectiveness by 5% if the target is an Earth elemental Hero.
When attacking, increases Effectiveness by 15% if the target is an Earth elemental Hero.
When attacking, increases Effectiveness by 30% if the target is an Earth elemental Hero.
Further decreases Combat Readiness when using Vengeful Strike.
Decreases Combat Readiness by an additional 1% when using Vengeful Strike.
Decreases Combat Readiness by an additional 3% when using Vengeful Strike.
Decreases Combat Readiness by an additional 5% when using Vengeful Strike.
Has a chance to grant increased Attack (Greater) to the caster when using Spiteful Annihilation.
Has a 1% chance to grant increased Attack (Greater) to the caster when using Spiteful Annihilation.
Has a 3% chance to grant increased Attack (Greater) to the caster when using Spiteful Annihilation.
Has a 5% chance to grant increased Attack (Greater) to the caster when using Spiteful Annihilation.
Increases damage dealt when attacking a target that has no buffs.
Increases damage dealt by 2% when attacking a target that has no buffs.
Increases damage dealt by 5% when attacking a target that has no buffs.
Increases damage dealt by 10% when attacking a target that has no buffs.
When buffs are successfully dispelled by Spiteful Annihilation, increases Combat Readiness of the ally except for the caster with the highest Attack.
When buffs are successfully dispelled by Spiteful Annihilation, increases Combat Readiness of the ally except for the caster with the highest Attack by 5%.
When buffs are successfully dispelled by Spiteful Annihilation, increases Combat Readiness of the ally except for the caster with the highest Attack by 12%.
When buffs are successfully dispelled by Spiteful Annihilation, increases Combat Readiness of the ally except for the caster with the highest Attack by 20%.

debuffs.name: Cannot Buff
debuffs.effect: Makes the target unable to be buffed.

localize.name: 伝道師 カーマイン・ローズ

skill1.name: 吸血
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、与えたダメージに応じて自身の生命力を回復する。

skill2.name: 怨恨の一撃
skill2.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、アクションゲージを35.0%DOWNさせる。

skill3.name: 怨魂抹殺
skill3.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、対象の強化効果をすべて解除し、強化不可を2ターンの間付与し、自身に攻撃力UP・防御力UPを2ターンの間付与する。
skill3.soul_description: 敵単体に攻撃し、対象の強化効果をすべて解除し、強化不可を2ターンの間付与し、自身に攻撃力UP・防御力UPを2ターンの間付与する。
